meanings.definition: A person who is involved in or supports commercial activities.
meanings.sent1: The local commercialist opened a new store in town.
meanings.sent2: The commercialist negotiated a deal with the supplier.
meanings.sent3: The commercialist joked that they could sell ice to an Eskimo.
meanings.sent4: She was a true commercialist, always seeking new business opportunities.
meanings.sent5: The commercialist's passion for commerce was unmatched.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of commercialism.
meanings.sent1: The commercialist approach to marketing focuses on profit.
meanings.sent2: Her commercialist mindset helped her succeed in the business world.
meanings.sent3: The commercialist decorations in the store attracted many customers.
meanings.sent4: His speech had a commercialist tone, emphasizing sales and revenue.
meanings.sent5: The commercialist nature of the advertisement appealed to consumers.
